entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Hunters Point
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023
